item.title: Fly tipping church walk, 17th November
item.description:
Rubbish left on lane with abandoned chest of drawers now added. Can you please urgently help clean up. Thank you!

item.title: Damaged manhole, 17th November
item.description:
This manhole is badly damaged and the cover bangs very loudly when traffic hits it, I live 100mtrs away and can here it with all windows closed.

item.title: Highways Agency & O vehicle needless all-night noise, 17th November
item.description:
Residential cul-de-sac Lumley St. Residenrs woken up & kept awake 2am-ish onwards to 7am-ish Highways Agency vehicle loading and/or unloading batches of barriers noisily. Even dumped one batch right by resident's bedroom windows. Banging noise. Engine noise. Reversing alarm. Not emergency works, why allowed to use residential street as an equipment depot all night? I am exhausted as have had so little aleep.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pitch 1719, Lumley Street, Mayfair, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drainage / sewage, 17th November
item.description:
